Module Slope.ECS
Package org.lucasstarsz.slope

Class World

java.lang.Object
org.lucasstarsz.slope.World
public class World
extends java.lang.Object
The glue holding the entire ECS together.

  • Constructor Details

    • World

      public World()

  • Method Details

    • init

      public void init()
      Initializes the manager with the default maximum entity count, as ECSDefaults.defaultMaxEntityCount.
      See Also:
      init(int)

    • init

      public void init​(int maxEntityCount)
      Initializes the manager with a specified maximum entity count.

      This method effectively resets the state of the entire ECS when called.

      Parameters:
      maxEntityCount - The maximum number of entities to allow within the ECS.

    • createEntity

      public int createEntity()
      Creates an entity if available, returning the newly created entity.
      Returns:
      The id of the created entity.

    • destroyEntity

      public void destroyEntity​(int entity)
      Destroys the specified entity, and all components tied to it.
      Parameters:
      entity - The entity to destroy.

    • registerComponent

      public <T extends IComponent> void registerComponent​(java.lang.Class<T> componentClass)
      Registers the specified class as a possible entity component.
      Type Parameters:
      T - The generic type of the class to register as a possible entity component. Uses of T must extend IComponent.
      Parameters:
      componentClass - The class to register as a possible container for components.

    • addComponent

      public <T extends IComponent> void addComponent​(int entity, T component)
      Binds the specified component to the entity specified.
      Type Parameters:
      T - The generic type of the component to be bound. Uses of T must implement IComponent.
      Parameters:
      entity - The entity to bind a component to.
      component - The component to bind.

    • removeComponent

      public <T extends IComponent> void removeComponent​(int entity, java.lang.Class<T> componentClass)
      Removes the specified component from the specified entity.
      Type Parameters:
      T - The generic type of the class which matches the class of the component to remove. Uses of T must implement IComponent.
      Parameters:
      entity - The entity to remove a component from.
      componentClass - The class of the component to be removed.

    • getComponent

      public <T extends IComponent> T getComponent​(int entity, java.lang.Class<T> componentClass)
      Gets the component of the specified class from the specified entity.
      Type Parameters:
      T - The generic type of the class of the component to get. Uses of T must extend IComponent.
      Parameters:
      entity - The entity to get the component from.
      componentClass - The class of the component to get.
      Returns:
      The component of the entity and class requested.

    • getComponentType

      public <T extends IComponent> int getComponentType​(java.lang.Class<T> componentClass)
      Gets the component type, as an integer, of the class specified.
      Type Parameters:
      T - The generic type of the component to be bound. Uses of T must implement IComponent.
      Parameters:
      componentClass - The class to get the component type of.
      Returns:
      The type of the component class, as an integer.

    • registerSystem

      public <T extends ECSSystem> T registerSystem​(java.lang.Class<T> systemClass)
      Creates and registers a ECSSystem based on the specified class.
      Type Parameters:
      T - The generic type of the system to create and register. Uses of T must extend ECSSystem.
      Parameters:
      systemClass - The class to register as a system.
      Returns:
      The created and registered ECSSystem.

    • registerSystem

      public <T extends ECSSystem> T registerSystem​(java.lang.Class<T> systemClass, java.util.LinkedHashMap<java.lang.Class<?>,​java.lang.Object> arguments)
      Creates and registers a ECSSystem based on the specified class and arguments.

      For information about the arguments parameter, see ECSSystemManager.registerSystem(Class, LinkedHashMap).

      Type Parameters:
      T - The generic type of the system to create and register. Uses of T must extend ECSSystem.
      Parameters:
      systemClass - The class to register as a system.
      arguments - The arguments to construct the system.
      Returns:
      The created and registered ECSSystem.
      See Also:
      ECSSystemManager.registerSystem(Class, LinkedHashMap)

    • setSystemSignature

      public <T extends ECSSystem> void setSystemSignature​(java.lang.Class<T> systemClass, java.util.BitSet signature)
      Sets the system manager's signature to the specified signature.
      Type Parameters:
      T - The generic type of the system to set the signature for. Uses of T must extend ECSSystem.
      Parameters:
      systemClass - The class of the system in use.
      signature - The signature to set.

      public int getMaxEntities()
